attributes.action: reinstate whistleblower nurse, Margaret Haywood, who was struck off
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Margaret Haywood filmed secretly for BBC Panorama at the Royal Sussex Hospital in Brighton, which at the time had the lowest rating of zero stars from healthcare regulators, an £8 million deficit and had received a number of complaints before filming started.

She was found guilty of misconduct at a hearing of the Nursing and Midwifery Council (NMC) in central London and was removed from the nursing register.

We believe that Margaret Haywood should be put back on the nursing register and reinstated because her actions were clearly in the public interest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
